xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/464766-Broken Sword Hero 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qWsGQKgrp6wpFXO8ShPbZgpdXDa.jpg Based on a real warrior from Thailands Ayutthaya period, 'Broken Sword Hero' follows the heroics of legendary military general Thongdee. From the disparity as a young runaway to the toughest warrior among his people, a legendary fighter with unparalleled skills in Muay Thai and swordplay, fights for the freedom of his people. Broken Sword Hero
